panels.description: Indication of whether all deployment containers are running.
panels.title: Deployment Status

panels.description: Indication of whether the scheduler is up and running its loop. An value of "Unknown" means that the airflow image is running an older version.
panels.title: Scheduler Heartbeat

panels.description: Maximum total pods allowed. Each airflow deployment namespace has resource quotas applied.
panels.title: Max Pods

panels.description: Maximum total CPU limits allowed. Each airflow deployment namespace has resource quotas applied.
panels.title: Max CPU

panels.description: Maximum total memory limits allowed. Each airflow deployment namespace has resource quotas applied.
panels.title: Max Memory

panels.description: Percentage of total pods in use currently. Each airflow deployment namespace has resource quotas applied.

targets.expr:
sum(kube_resourcequota{resource="pods", type="used", release=~"$deployment", resourcequota=~"$deployment-resource-quota"})
/
sum(kube_resourcequota{resource="pods", type="hard", release=~"$deployment", resourcequota=~"$deployment-resource-quota"})*100

panels.title: Running Pods

panels.description: Percentage of total CPU limits in use currently. Each airflow deployment namespace has resource quotas applied.
panels.title: Reserved CPU

panels.description: Percentage of total memory limits in use currently. Each airflow deployment namespace has resource quotas applied.
panels.title: Reserved Memory

panels.description: Total successful tasks.
panels.title: Successful Tasks

panels.description: Total failed tasks.
panels.title: Failed Tasks

panels.description: Amount of DAGs the scheduler is processing.
panels.title: Dagbag Size

panels.description: Tasks that have not sent a heartbeat in a while.
panels.title: Zombies Killed

panels.description: Rate of task successes.
panels.title: Task Success Rate

panels.description: Rate of task failures.
panels.title: Task Failure Rate

panels.description: TimeSeries Graph showing rate of Scheduler Heartbeart Rate per min. 0 indicate Scheduler outage
panels.title: Scheduler Heartbeat Rate

panels.description: Total connections to the backend database.
panels.title: Total Database Connections

panels.description: Number of airflow clients waiting for a connection to the backend database.
panels.title: Total Waiting Clients

panels.description: Actual CPU utilization across deployment containers.

targets.expr: label_replace(  sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{deployment=~"$deployment", component_name != "POD",image!="", container_name!="istio-proxy"}[3m])) by (pod_name, container_name, component_name, namespace, short_name)/  sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{deployment=~"$deployment",  component_name != "POD",image!="", container_name!="istio-proxy"}/container_spec_cpu_period{deployment=~"$deployment",  component_name != "POD",image!="", container_name!="istio-proxy"}) by (pod_name, container_name, component_name, namespace, short_name)*100,  "short_name",  "$1",  "pod_name",  "^[[deployment]]-(.*)$")

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Actual memory utilization across deployment containers.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Received data across deployment containers.
panels.title: Network Rx

panels.description: Transmitted data across deployment containers.
panels.title: Network Tx

panels.description: Status of containers that make up an airflow deployment. A failing status here will make the deployment above show Unhealthy.

targets.expr:
sort_desc(max by (container, pod, reason) (  
max by (container, pod) ( 
sort_desc(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{release=~"$deployment", container=~".*(scheduler|scheduler-gc|webserver|worker|statsd|pgbouncer|metrics-exporter|redis|flower)"} 
and on(pod,namespace) kube_pod_labels{label_dag_id=""})  )   
or  max by (container, reason) (      sort_desc(kube_pod_container_status_waiting_reason{release=~"$deployment", container=~".*(scheduler|scheduler-gc|webserver|worker|statsd|pgbouncer|metrics-exporter|redis|flower)"}==1 and on(pod,namespace) kube_pod_labels{label_dag_id=""}) )   
or  max by (container, reason) (    sort_desc(kube_pod_container_status_terminated_reason{release=~"$deployment", container=~".*(scheduler|scheduler-gc|webserver|worker|statsd|pgbouncer|metrics-exporter|redis|flower)"}==1 and on(pod,namespace) kube_pod_labels{label_dag_id=""}) )))

panels.title: Core Container Status

panels.description: Kubernetes executor pods only

targets.expr:
sort_desc(max by (container, pod, reason) (
  max by (container, pod) (    
  sort_desc(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{release=~"$deployment"} and on(pod,namespace) kube_pod_labels{label_dag_id!=""})  ) 
  or  max by (container, reason) (    
  sort_desc(kube_pod_container_status_waiting_reason{release=~"$deployment"}==1 and on(pod,namespace) kube_pod_labels{label_dag_id!=""}) ) 
  or  max by (container, reason) (    sort_desc(kube_pod_container_status_terminated_reason{release=~"$deployment"}==1 and on(pod,namespace) kube_pod_labels{label_dag_id!=""}) )))

panels.title: Task Container Status
